mapper.select: select u.userid,u.username,u.nickname,u.password,u.phone, u.mobile,u.deptid,u.roleid,u.create_time,u.state, u.wxopenid,u.qqopenid,u.dr,u.userphoto,u.email,u.ischange,u.deptgroup from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.state = 0 and u.email = #{paramter}
select * from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.state = 0 and u.userid = #{userid} and u.password = #{password}

select u.userid,u.username,u.nickname,u.password,u.email,u.userphoto,u.phone, u.mobile,u.deptid,u.roleid,u.state,u.sex,u.dr,u.create_time, u.update_id,u.update_time,u.note, d.deptname,r.rolename ,u.deptgroup from hj_user u left join hj_dept d on d.deptid = u.deptid left join hj_role r on r.roleid = u.roleid where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.state = 0 and u.userid = #{paramter}
select * from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.state = 0 and ( u.phone = #{phone} or u.email = #{email}) order by u.create_time desc
select u.userid,u.username,u.deptgroup,u.deptid,u.roleid from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and (u.deptid = 2 or u.roleid in (4,6,8,10,12,14,16,18))
select u.userid,u.username,u.deptgroup,u.deptid,u.roleid from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.state = 0 and (u.deptid > 3)
select * from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.username like concat('%','${username}','%')
select * from hj_user u where 1=1 and u.dr = 0 and u.userid=#{userid}
